Title: The Impossible Planet (1)
Plot:
Location: In orbit below a black hole
Date: Possibly 43,000 (43K reference)
Enemy: The Beast,The Ood (as The Legion of The Beast)

Rose finds herself further away from home than ever before, on a desolate world in the orbit of a Black Hole. Trapped with an Earth expedition and the mysterious Ood, the time-travellers face an even greater danger as something ancient beneath the planet's surface begins to awake.
ParentalRatingReason: PG Some scenes may scare very young children
GuestStars: Paul Kasey, Shaun Parkes, Gabriel Woolf, Ronny Jhutti, Claire Rushbrook, Myanna Buring, Danny Webb, Will Thorp, Silas Carson
